please_share_me.message: Please, share this extension at least one time for unlock advanced settings! Thank you! :)

share.message: Yes. I want unlock Advanced Settings

send_stats_advise.message: You can send me your Pretty Facebook Chat configuration. That's only for developing purpose (so I can see major configurations). Do you want help me? :)
